resources.string:
Dear comrades!

A red alert sounds as Earth faces an unforeseen threat from the distant universe. An extraterrestrial force is conducting an invasion of our space, plunging everything into the darkness of destruction.

In this urgent situation, comrades are the last light, the last hope of humanity. Pilot our most advanced fighter aircraft and defend Earth from the ravages of the enemy. Everything depends on you - only strength and determination can save the future of mankind.

The fate of Earth rests on you. Prepare for the final battle and determine our future!
